channel.title: Tops on Ron Kelley
channel.description: Recent content in Tops on Ron Kelley

item.description: About Me I am Ron Kelley - Team Leader, Mentor, Infrastructure Architect, and hard-core Technology Nerd. My passion lies in the entire infrastructure stack - from hardware, to software, to firmware. I love building out high-performance compute environments ranging from single-host virtualization servers to multi-rack configurations that span multiple networks, compute farms, and storage systems. A self-starter by nature, I enjoy deploying virtualization clusters, installing Linux via PXE, configuring IPSec tunnels on pfSense firewalls, setting up haproxy and nginx app stacks, configuring LXD containers, and lots of other cool stuff.
Machine learning学习笔记 Coursera 在线课程 Machine learning 笔记讲师: 吴恩达(Andrew Ng) 课程地址：https://www.coursera.org/lear
